description.en:
I don’t want to work. I really don’t want to work. But I have no choice.
Problems with Humans, Elves, Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and such alien immigrants never seem to cease.
800 years of disgusted employment. The struggles of a man who will die if he stops working.

title.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited… and ended up breaking up on graduation.  
  
And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.  
  
“Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder brother.” “Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder sister.”  
  
The children of the partner of their parent’s remarriage was their ex-lover!?  
  
The former couple, mindful of their parent’s feelings, decided on a ‘sibling rule’ where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but—  
  
When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together… along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?  

---

- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

description.ko:
After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?

description.en:
“Those wearing armor shall never take off their arms, will never die, and will live in pain.”

With a witch’s curse, the ‘Cursed Knights’ began to roam the world.

And Enoch, a boy who encounters one, is about to discover what happens to him.

altTitles.zh: 勇者们都想和魔王修炼

altTitles.en: The Brave Men All Want to Practice Asceticism With the Devil King

altTitles.zh-ro: Yongzhemen Dou Xiang He Mowang Xilian
Yǒngzhěmen Dōu Xiǎng Hé Mówáng Xiūliàn

altTitles.zh-hk: 勇者們都想和魔王修煉

description.en: The cold-blooded Demon King who has beaten all his enemies, who has always been second to none, ended up losing all his magical powers to a female hero who hexed him. What is this magical ritual that you do with the opposite sex’s lips? I can’t believe that even I, the formidable Demon King, have been defeated by this mysterious move! But no worries, I can retrain my abilities. It doesn't matter if you’re a succubus, an elf, a beast woman, or a noble hero’s descendant. I’ll use you as my training partner if I can help it. In order to revive the demon race, I’ll show you the Dual Cultivation Method!

altTitles.ja: 宇宙人ミミ
まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!

altTitles.ja: サジちゃんの病み日記

description.en: Sazi-chan has a girl she likes. Though her feelings are too pure for anyone to understand, it is definitely true love. Taking pictures, stealing, stabbing, assaulting, that too, is love.

title.en: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ～Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru～

altTitles.ja: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～

altTitles.en: Class <<Unemployed>> Heroic Tale: Exiled from the Duke's House, but i found out that i can acquire skills just by punching and now i am climbing to the top of the continent ~
Chronicles of the Jobless Hero~Ousted From the Duke’s Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent’s Ultimate Hero~

description.en:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one’s life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance…

- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- [Alternative Raw Link: Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
description.ja: 18歳になると神から「クラス」が与えられる世界。クラスの持つ「スキル」の有無は、どんな努力をも上回り、どんなクラスかでその後の人生が決まってしまう。そんな不平等な世界で、聖騎士を目指し訓練してきたリートは、クラス分けで無情にも<無職>を言い渡され、父親である公爵の手により、街を追放されてしまう。そして荷物持ちで糊口をしのいでいたある日、商隊が盗賊に襲われる。子どもを救うため戦うが、戦闘スキル持ちに敵うはずもなくリートは死を覚悟する。しかし、最後の抵抗で盗賊を殴った瞬間、頭の中に不思議な声が鳴り響き…。

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: アタゴオル物語

description.en:
Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. 
The story revolves around the adventures of Hideyoshi, a big young cat, and his friends.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: I Am the Strongest Lord in Another World

description.en:
Richard, a transmigrator, became a pioneering aristocrat in another world. At the time, the natives were invading the country from the front and a noble with ill intentions was plotting behind the scenes. Richard only had a few things to rely on and one of them was called... The Lord System.

Creating frontiers to build castles, finding dwarves to buy equipment and much more! Bearmen, minotaurs, goblins... all kinds of enemies were invading one after another! The road to becoming the mightiest lord begins!

altTitles.ja: きみのためのエデン

description.en:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?

altTitles.th: ก๊วนป่วนชวนบุ๋งบุ๋ง

altTitles.ja: ぐらんぶる

description.en:
A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. 
Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10058/episode/318585) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/306-grand-blue-dreaming)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ «کیتاهارا ایوری» پسری است که برای شروع دوره دانشجویی خود به شهر دریایی «ایزو» می رود؛ او که از روبرو شدن با زندگی جدید خود اشتیاق فراوانی دارد به این فکر است که در فروشگاه لوازم غواصی عموی خود که به نام Grand Blue (گرند بلو) شناخته می شود مشغول به کار شود. آنجا او دریایی پر از دلخوشی را می یابد، دخترانی زیبا را به چشم می بیند و همچنین مردانی که عاشق غواصی هستند و وقت خودشان را به نوشیدن انواع نوشیدنی ها می گذرانند ملاقات می کند. حال باید دید که ایوری می تواند زندگی دانشجویی دلخواهش را در این شهر دنبال کند یا خیر؟!
description.ru: Новая жизнь Китахары Ёри начинается с момента поступления в колледж, который находится на берегу океана в городе Идзу. В предвкушении новых эмоций парень отправляется в дазин своего дяди «Необъятный океан». Здесь его ждет красивый океан, прекрасные женщины и мужчины, что любят дайвинг и алкоголь. Сможет ли Ёри прожить студенческую жизнь своей мечты?
description.pt-br: Uma nova vida começa para Kitahara Iori, que entrou na faculdade perto do mar, na cidade de Izu. Emocionado por um novo começo, ele se muda para casa do seu tio, uma loja de mergulho chamada "Grand Blue". Lá, ele encontra um lindo oceano, belas mulheres, e os homens que gostam de mergulho e álcool... Será que Iori vai ser capaz de viver sua tão sonhada vida universitária? Do mesmo autor de Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu, uma nova comédia começa!

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakama Tachi Ni Dungeon Okuchi De Korosare Kaketa ga Gift 『Mugen Gacha』 De Level 9999 No Nakama Tachi Wo Te Ni Irete Moto Party Member To Sekai Ni Fukushu & 『Zamaa!』 Shimasu!

altTitles.ja: 信じていた仲間達にダンジョン奥地で殺されかけたがギフト『無限ガチャ』でレベル9999の仲間達を手に入れて元パーティーメンバーと世界に復讐&『ざまぁ!』します!

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakamatachi ni Dungeon Ouchi de Korosarekaketa ga Gift "Mugen Gacha" de Level 9999 no Nakamatachi wo Te ni Irete Moto Party Member to Sekai ni Fukushuu & "Zamaa!" Shimasu!

altTitles.en: Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

I Was Almost Killed By The Teammates I trust Inside A Dungeon, And Gained A Gift Called [Infinite Gacha] And Level 9999 Comrades, And Now I'll Take Revenge Against My Former Teammates And The World, That's What You Get!
Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

description.en:
There are six races in this world: human, beast, dragon, elf, dwarf, and demon. Humans are discriminated against and looked down on as the most inferior race. The "Gathering of Races" was a party with members from each race gathered to dispel such discrimination, but they also had a hidden purpose. They were ordered by the non-human countries to search for the human "Master," and take it to their own country.

Light, a human boy with the gift "Infinite Gacha," was welcomed into the Gathering of Races as he was suspected of being a Master. But in the end, their investigation showed that Light was not a Master. Just as Light was about to be killed by his teammates, he accidentally stepped on a transfer trap and was teleported to the lowest level of the dungeon.

In the deepest dungeon, he was attacked by a mythical level 1000 demon. In a desperate situation, Light used "Infinite Gacha" repeatedly. Luckily, he draws the SUR level 9999 card "Mei the Seeker Maid." Mei helped Light repel the demons and saved his life.

After finally escaping from the crisis, Light decides to take revenge on his former comrades. Mei advises him to remain in the dungeon and use Infinite Gacha to increase his number of trustworthy friends. Light agreed began building up the power necessary to oppose the non-human nations.

Three years later, Light had built the strongest nation in the depths of the dungeon. Once again, he will return to the surface to take revenge on his former comrades and search for the truth that nearly killed him.
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10040/episode/345702)
description.ja:
仲間に裏切られ、最凶のダンジョン『奈落』の底に突き落とされた少年・ライト。彼に残されたのはゴミだと思われたスキル『無限ガチャ』のみ！　最悪な状況から少年の逆転劇が始まる!!!　

9つの種族の平等を掲げ結成された冒険者パーティー『種族の集い』。荷物持ちの少年・ライトは、パーティーの仲間達に裏切られ最凶ダンジョン『奈落』の奥で命を狙われる…。絶体絶命の危機、ライトがすがるのは恩恵『無限ガチャ』!!!
description.pt-br: Um menino chamado Light é traído por seus companheiros e mergulha no abismo da masmorra mais perigosa do mundo. Tudo o que ele têm é a Bênção (habilidade) "Gacha Infinita", que ele pensou ser um lixo! Começa a vingança de um garoto na pior situação possível!

description.en: I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~

altTitles.ja: 金魚屋さんのかりそめ夫婦

description.en:
The story of a contract marriage set in an old-fashioned goldfish shop. 

Asahi and Nana are newlyweds who run a goldfish shop. At first glance, they seem to be a normal couple, but in fact, they are a contractual couple who got married because of their mutual interests! They are not true husband and wive,  let alone lovers. And yet...

[I'm sorry. I know this is our first time meeting, but will you marry me?]

altTitles.ja: 阿波連さんははかれない

description.en: From the author of Denkigai no Honya-san and Dansai Joshi comes a short-length comedy about Matsuboshi Raidou-kun and his seatmate Aharen Reina-san, who has problems determining how chummy she has to be when approaching other people. Get up close and personal with the small, quiet but unfathomable girl, Aharen-san!
description.ja: 「小さくて」、「物静か」な阿波連れいなさん。隣の席に座るライドウくんは、そんな阿波連さんに距離を感じていた。ある日、阿波連さんが落とした消しゴムをライドウくんが拾ったことで、今度は予想外の急接近!?　「遠すぎたり」「近すぎたり」予測不能な阿波連さん。
description.uk: Історія про дівчину на ім'я Ахарен. Вона нещодавно переїхала в інше місто і перейшла до нової школи, де намагається знайомитися з однокласниками та однокласницями. Ось тільки дівчина не з тих, хто соромиться і просто сидить осторонь. Вона просто не знає, що таке особисте простір, і справді може просто підійти до будь-якого однолітка і говорити з ним, як зі своїм найкращим другом. А ще головна героїня часто обіймає хлопців та дівчат, і навіть може покласти на колінки свою голову. Вона дивна, але водночас мила, і намагається бути популярною серед однокласників.
description.vi: Câu chuyện kể về Raidou và cô bạn bàn bên Aharen, một người có vấn đề trong việc xác định khoảng cách khi tiếp xúc với người khác.
description.pt-br: Uma nova comédia sobre Raidou e sua colega de classe Aharen-san, que tem problemas em determinar o quão íntima deve ser quando se aproximar de outras pessoas. Junte-se a pequena, calma, mas incompreensível garota, Aharen-san!
description.zh-hk:
在各方面都讓人『無法預測』的青春戀愛喜劇第１集登場!!

阿波連玲奈同學是個「個子嬌小」又「文靜」的人，
讓座位在她隔壁的來堂同學覺得很有距離感。
某天，來堂同學幫阿波連同學撿起掉到地上的橡皮擦，
使得兩人出乎意料地急速靠近!?

「一下子視而不見」，「一下子親密互動」，
阿波連同學的行為讓人無法預測!!

如果喜歡《高木同學》讓人心癢癢的撩人互動，
那麼更不應該錯過這部「行動派」的搞笑放閃。
看來堂胡思亂想的內心
與阿波連無法預測的行為，
如何碰撞出時而吐糖、時而噴飯的無俚頭戀愛喜劇！

altTitles.ja: 四畳半のいばら姫

description.en:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again

altTitles.ja: ケンガンオメガ

description.en: Sequel to Kengan Asura. Takes place 2 years after the tournament.

title.en: Kaoru Watashi ni Kiss wo shite.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru watashi ni Kiss o shite

altTitles.ja: 香るわたしにキスをして。

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Watashi ni Kiss wo Shite.

description.en:
"You smell so good." "Sorry, but I might not be able to let you go."
 Touka, who secretly has a crush on her senior, is bewildered to find out he felt for her scent. Things develop quickly and she decides to support his dream of becoming a perfumer while they become dangerously close.

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

altTitles.ja: 包帯ごっこ

description.en: Hirose Itsuki is a high school girl who is afraid of getting hurt. One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!

altTitles.ja: 恋に無駄口

description.en: The romantic comedy centers on a high school boy who is wasting his youth.

altTitles.ja: 青春ヘビーローテーション

description.en:
Nao falls in love at first sight with the hottie prince Haruna-kun, who helps her overcome anxiety during the high school entrance examination. She safely gets into high school and feels that she’s fated to the guy sitting next to her. However, Haruna-kun is very popular and has a habit of saying “I hate girls who tell me they like me.”. Even so, Haruna-kun still messes with Nao.
Nao gradually falls in love with him as she gets to know him better. Haruna-kun may look mean, but he’s actually very kind.
description.es-la: Nao se enamora a primera vista del príncipe Haruna-kun, quien la ayuda a superar la ansiedad durante el examen de ingreso a la escuela preparatoria. Ella ingresa sana y salva a la preparatoria y siente que es el destino que el chico que la ayudó se sentará a su lado. Sin embargo, Haruna-kun es muy popular y tiene la costumbre de decir: "Odio a las chicas que me dicen que les gusto". Aun así, Haruna-kun todavía se involucra con Nao. Nao poco a poco se enamora de él a medida que lo va conociendo mejor. Haruna-kun puede parecer malo pero en realidad es muy amable.

altTitles.ja: トモダチゲーム

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.tr: Katagiri Yuichi, arkadaşların paranın öneminden daha önemli olduğuna inanır, ancak yetersiz fonların zorluklarını da bilir. Lise gezisine gitmeyi taahhüt ettiği dört en iyi arkadaşıyla birlikte gitmeyi planlar ve bu yüzden para biriktirmek için çalışır. Ancak, sınıfın topladığı paranın hepsi çalınır! Şüphe, Yuichi'nin arkadaşları Sawaragi Shiho ve Shibe Makoto üzerine düşer.Kısa bir süre sonra, beşi kaçırılır ve garip bir odada, kısa ömürlü bir animenin karakteriyle uyanırlar. Görünüşe göre, onlardan biri büyük bir borcu ödemek için bir "arkadaşlık oyunu" na girmiştir. Ancak kimdi ve neden böyle bir borcu vardı? Sınıftan parayı çalıp oyunun giriş ücretini ödeyebilirler miydi? Katagiri ve en iyi arkadaşları, birbirlerine olan inançlarını test edecek veya yok edecek psikolojik oyunlarda başarılı olmak zorunda kalacaklar.
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

altTitles.en: The Blue Star on That Day

altTitles.ja: あの頃の青い星

description.en: Koumoto Umi, a normal high school girl, falls in love with the pretty girl from the class next door, Segawa Shou. Even though she feels overwhelmed by her feelings, she can’t help but want to get closer to the mysterious Shou.
description.pt-br: Koumoto Umi, uma garota normal do ensino médio, se apaixona pela garota bonita da sala ao lado, Segawa Shou. Mesmo que ela se sinta sobrecarregada com esses sentimentos, ela não consegue evitar de se aproximar da misteriosa Shou.

title.en: Koi De Tokeru Girudo Za Lily

altTitles.ja: 恋でとけるギルド・ザ・リリー

description.en:
Former Host No.1 – Asuka Loses Her Throne To Rookie Kyouji!

Asuka, who has always held the No.1 Host position for many years, was suddenly usurped by Kyouji, a brand new rookie, in a spectacular way. Determined to regain the No.1 position, Asuka tries her best but continuously fails, even having to ask Kyouji for help to solve the problem...

Newly emerging typical bad boy No.1 vs Arrogant good boy former No.1 - 
Romantic night love story for crazy fans officially begins!

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ カラー版

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure.

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.

“You’ve manifested as a recessive Omega.”
No way…But I only came here to get a check up for a bad hangover?!
Overworked and overwhelmed with stress, Back-End Developer, Jinha, manifested as an Omega.
Jinha brews resentment for the leader of the Strategic Planning Team, Hyunjoon, and decides to open a savings account solely to save money to later hire a hitman.
But of course, bad luck comes in threes.
Now that his body is vulnerable to other’s pheromones, the only way to stabilize his body and its craving is with Hyunjoon’s refreshing pheromones.
But the only thing that Jinha can trust is Modern Medicine!
When seeking medical advice to somehow overcome his situation, the only prescription given to him as the safest method, is to have sex with someone that’s compatible and of the same gender.
Not only is Jinha feeling hopeless as he navigates through his hardship, but a stalker appears and attempts to shower him with his pheromones.
Finding himself with no other choice, Jinha asks Hyunjoon for help.

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

altTitles.ja: 美魔女の綾乃さん

description.en:
Ayano-san is a beautiful housewife with a son, Yuusei, who doesn't seem to approve of her carefree ways. Always smiling and well-meaning, Ayano-san still finds a way to make herself an object of curiosity and appreciation by passing people. 

---

Translator note: "Bimajyo" (lit. "beautiful witch") is a term apparently used in Japan to describe a woman older than 35 or so who has retained her great beauty, almost as if by magic. It doesn't mean she's a literal witch or that the series will pivot to that genre in the future.
description.pt: Ayano-san é uma linda dona de casa com um filho chamado Yuusei, que não parece gostar muito da forma despreocupada da sua mãe agir. Sempre sorridente e carinhosa, Ayano-san continua encontrando formas de torna-se um objeto de interesse e apreço ao passar pelas pessoas.

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…
description.fr: À l’âge de vingt ans, Seol Mudok, un maître de l’épée, est devenu le seigneur du Palais des glaces de la mer du Nord. Plongé dans le désespoir après la mort de son amante, il découvre qu’avec la fleur légendaire, le « Lotus de l’Amour », sa défunte amante s’est réincarné. Dans sa quête, il descend dans un autre monde…

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Meteor Mission!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボールヒーローズ メテオミッション！

description.en:
After defeating Dark King Demigra, Goku, and his allies go to visit the Planet of the Kaio, only to find that Kaio North and co. are nowhere to be seen...
While our heroes are trying to figure out what could have happened, a mysterious new foe appears!
description.es:
Después de derrotar al Rey Oscuro Demigra, Goku y sus aliados van a visitar el Planeta Kaio, solo para descubrir que Kaio North y compañía no se ven por ninguna parte...
Mientras nuestros héroes intentan descubrir qué pudo haber sucedido, ¡aparece un nuevo enemigo misterioso!
description.ja:
冥王デミグラを倒した悟空たちは界王星を訪れるが、そこには界王ノースたちがいた。 どこにも見当たりません...
ヒーローたちが何が起こったのかを解明しようとしている間に、謎の新たな敵が現れます。

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王
遊戯王

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

title.en: Ie ga Moete Jinsei Dou Demo Yoku Natta kara, Nokotta Nakenashi no Kin de Dark Elf no Dorei o Katta.

altTitles.ja-ro: Ie ga Moete Jinsei Dō Demo Yoku Nattakara, Nokotta Nakenashi no Kin de Dark Elf no Dorei o Katta.

altTitles.en: Since I Didn't Have Anything Left to Lose in Life After My House Burned Down, I Bought a Dark Elf Slave With the Remains of My Meager Savings.

altTitles.ja: 家が燃えて人生どうでも良くなったから、残ったなけなしの金でダークエルフの奴隷を買った。

altTitles.zh-hk: 家被燒掉的我買了個奴隸

altTitles.zh: 家被烧掉的我买了个奴隶

altTitles.ko: 집이 불타서 인생이 아무래도 좋아졌기 때문에, 얼마 안 되는 남은 돈으로 다크 엘프의 노예를 샀다.

description.en:
He lost his new home and all his property, but found a cute girl!  
   
Harold, a poor laborer who saved for years, finally obtained the house of his dreams, only to lose it to a fire the very same day. Feeling like nothing mattered anymore, Harold finds himself at an auction, where he ends up spending all of his savings on a slave, Atie…  
  
Harold, with his secret technique, and Atie, with her skills as an adventurer, begin their freewheeling journey now!  
Drawn by hentai artist.
  
[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0884fk/)
description.ja: 貯金に貯金を重ね念願のマイホームを手に入れたが、即日火事で失った貧乏労働者・ハロルド。すべてがどうでもよくなったハロルドは、偶然立ち寄った競売で貯金全てを使い、奴隷・アティを買ってしまうのだが…。秘密の技を持つハロルドと冒険者スキルを持つアティの気ままな旅が今、始まる！

title.en: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ不遇スキルの異世界召喚叛逆記～最弱スキル【吸収】が全てを飲み込むまで～

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

description.en: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

altTitles.ja: 君を奏でたい

description.en: Kim Hayeon was just covering for a friend at their day job when she unexpectedly ends up inside cellist Ji Sehun’s private waiting room. Despite his immense musical talent, Sehun is aloof and cold-hearted, and doesn’t take kindly to Hayeon’s intrusion. Though he accuses her of attempted theft, he cannot get her out of his mind, and attempts to court her. But while Hayeon may be timid, she is not easily won over. If this cellist isn’t careful, he may end up being the one getting played.
description.pt-br: Kim Hayeon estava apenas cobrindo uma amiga em seu trabalho diário quando inesperadamente acaba dentro da sala de espera privada do violoncelista Ji Sehun. Apesar de seu imenso talento musical, Sehun é indiferente e insensível, e não gosta da intromissão de Hayeon. Embora ele a acuse de tentativa de roubo, ele não consegue tirá-la da cabeça e vai tentar cortejá-la. Mas enquanto Hayeon pode ser tímida, ela não é facilmente conquistada.

title.en: Demon King of the Royal Class

altTitles.en: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

altTitles.es-la: El Principe Demonio va a la Academia

description.en:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 映しちゃダメな顔

description.en:
Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her, and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress... 

Serialized in Yuri Hime beginning in the July 2023 issue.

description.en:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15 his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were : "The Highest Peak of the Human Race【Hero】", "The Strongest Ruler 【Demon Emperor】", "The Title of the Strongest Magician 【Great Sage】", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum【Slave Merchant】". None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title 【Slave Merchant】, which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.  
  
This is Tale of The strongest【Slave Merchant】unwillingly makes a big success!
description.id:
Zeoris menginginkan kehidupan yang santai, tetapi ketika dia berusia 15 tahun, aturan desanya adalah bahwa mereka harus pergi ke sekolah keahlian “Velciel” di mana setiap siswa akan memilih profesi mereka. Zeoris menginginkan pekerjaan yang mudah di mana dia bisa bermalas-malasan sepanjang hari, tetapi satu-satunya pilihan yang dia dapatkan adalah: “Puncak Tertinggi dari Ras Manusia 【HERO】”, “Penguasa Terkuat 【Demon Emperor】”, “Gelar yang Terkuat Penyihir 【Great Sage】 “,” Dan yang terakhir “Tittle Terendah, Pekerjaan Untuk Sampah 【Slave Merchant】”. Tidak ada gelar yang merupakan pilihan bagus. Dia memilih gelar terendah 【Slave Merchant】, yang tidak mencolok di antara mereka dan tampaknya mudah untuk hidup.  
  
Tapi, dia belum mengetahuinya. Itu adalah pekerjaan paling rendah tetapi itu yang terkuat baginya dan yang paling melelahkan. Perjuangan harem untuk diombang-ambingkan oleh berbagai wanita, gadis cantik yang memikat dari tua hingga yang lebih muda yang merupakan teman masa kecilnya, gadis tumbuhan beracun, elf, petualang telinga kucing, Loli Demon Lord, dan lain-lain.  
  
Ini adalah Dongeng Terkuat 【Slave Merchant】 yang enggan membuat sukses besar!
